  • Uses of Action in it.polimi.ingsw.model.Actions

    Classes in it.polimi.ingsw.model.Actions that implement Action 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  BuildAction
    this action is used to return the player the set of possible actions and it's used to indicate that the player have chosen to do a build action
    class  DestroyAction
    this action is used to return the player the set of possible actions and it's used to indicate that the player have chosen to do a destroy action
    class  FinishAction
    this action is used to return the player the set of possible actions and it's used to indicate that the player have chosen to end his turn
    class  ForceAction
    this action is used to return the player the set of possible actions and it's used to indicate that the player have chosen to force action
    class  MoveAction
    this action is used to return the player the set of possible actions and it's used to indicate that the player have chosen to do a move action
